data.name: Rust Books
PitchBlack - Inverted colors
data.description:
Basically this just inverts all colors on the site.
Since most of it is white this turns it pitch black for the most part.

I can probably change a lot if you want me to. 
Just let me know what you would like to see and i will see if i can implement it.

data.description: This CSS requires the user to have enabled Dark Theme within the Twitch settings as it replaces the default Dark Theme to Lights out.
